channel.title: Editing run server
channel.description: OK well u now how u have to edit the compiler well do u have to do the same for the run server? because i have a problem see i change my stuff in client.java and the source that i am using is allstar-scape and u know how when u download a source it says all there stuff so when i click on run server it says -allstar-scape v1-...Online i want it to run my server not there's yes i am a noob but one of my goals for the end of 2008 is to have a server up and running could someone plzz take the time to help me?

item.title: Editing run server
item.dc:creator: @slotyscape slotyscape
item.description:
@slotyscape wrote:

tyvm u helped out alot i just need to fix one more thing and my servers up so happy ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Editing run server
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:4, topic:249604”][quote author=Benz link=topic=328989.msg2572822#msg2572822 date=1228780225]

Seriously! Stop posting unless you can use fucking grammar!

Well, if you think about it, his is actually quite advanced compared to most of the users on MoparScape. Don’t make posts like that, it’s clear your intentions are those of an immature child who only wants to practice some deluded form of elitism.

@OP: It is running “your” server, however in server.java, when the thread begins, it’s printing “-allstar-scape v1-… Online!” instead of your server’s name.

Just go to server.java and replace the name.
[/quote]
My intentions are to help, but I cannot help without understanding what he is asking.[/quote]

If I can understand it, you certainly should be able to. You need to take the time to read before you hit Quick Reply, do you understand?

Translated text:

OP:

Ok, well you know how you have to edit the compiler? Well do you have to do the same for the runserver (runserver.bat)? Because I have a problem. See, I change my stuff in client.java and the source that I am using is Allstar-Scape. And you know how when you download a source it says all their stuff (features)? So when I click runserver.bat it says “-Allstar-Scape v1-… Online”, I want to run my server not theirs. Yes, I am a noob but one of my goals for the end of 2008 is to have a server up and running; could someone please take the time and help me?

It’s not hard, you get the gist.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Well, if you think about it, his is actually quite advanced compared to most of the users on MoparScape. Don’t make posts like that, it’s clear your intentions are those of an immature child who only wants to practice some deluded form of elitism.

@OP: It is running “your” server, however in server.java, when the thread begins, it’s printing “-allstar-scape v1-… Online!” instead of your server’s name.

Just go to server.java and replace the name.[/quote]
My intentions are to help, but I cannot help without understanding what he is asking.

Read full topic
